sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{x }{k } = \frac{y }{l } = \frac{z }{m }
\]
Then show that 
\[
	\frac{x ^3 }{k ^3} + \frac{y ^3 }{l ^3} + \frac{z ^3}{m ^3} = \frac{3xyz }{klm }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{} }{k } = \frac{\input[s1v2]{} }{l } = \frac{z }{m } = n \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = kn , y = ln , z = mn 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, left hand side of the equation can be written as 
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{x ^3 }{k ^3} + \frac{y ^3 }{l ^3} + \frac{z ^3}{m ^3}
\]
\[
	= \frac{(\input[s2v1]{}n )^3}{k ^3} + \frac{(\input[s2v2]{}n )^3}{l ^3} + \frac{(mn )^3}{m ^3} 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "\[
	= n ^3 + \input[s3v1]{} ^3 + n ^3 = 3 \input[s3v2]{} ^3
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, right hand side of the equation can be written as
\[
\textrm{RHS } = \frac{3 xyz }{klm }
\]
\[
= \frac{3 (k\input[s4v1]{} )(ln )(mn )}{klm }
\]
\[
= 3\input[s4v2]{} ^3
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From the above two expressions, we can see that
\[
\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["x", "y"], "text": "$$\text{After assumption $\frac{x }{k } = \frac{y }{l} = \frac{z }{m } = n$ and taking terms separately we get $x = kn , y = ln , z = mn$}$$"}, {"data": ["k", "l"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking LHS, and substituting the value of $x$, $y$, and $z$, in the LHS we get $\frac{(kn )^3}{k ^3} + \frac{(ln )^3}{l ^3} + \frac{(mn )^3}{m ^3}$}$$"}, {"data": ["n", "n"], "text": "$$\text{"Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $n ^3 + n ^3 + n ^3 = 3 n ^3$}$$"}, {"data": ["n", "n"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking RHS, and substituting the value of $x$, $y$, and $z$, in the RHS we get $\frac{3(kn)(ln)(mn)}{klm}=3n^2$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
